segments.text: I can ’ t wait to retire .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And then I ’ m moving to Florida where I can play golf all day , every day !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you plan on doing after you retire ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think I will do something new . I ’ Ve always wanted to be a teacher . I ’ m willing to begin studying to teach .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I admire your energy , Ruth . You are young at heart .
segments.speaker: S1
